text: Shuriken Sentai Ninninger is a Japanese television series. It is the 39th in Toei's Super Sentai series. Super Hero Time joined Kamen Rider Drive and then Kamen Rider Ghost. ==Characters== ===Ninninger / Igasaki Clan=== Actor Name Rangers Robot Shunsuke Nishiwawa Takaharu Igasaki Akaninger Shinobimaru Gaku Matsumoto Yakumo "Cloud" Kato Aoninger Dragomaru Kaito Nakamura Nagi Matsuo Kininger Dumpmaru Yuka Yano Fuka Igasaki Shironinger Wanmaru Kasumi Yamaya Kasumi Momochi Momoninger Byunmaru Hideya Tawada Kinji Takigawa Starninger Bison King and Rodeomaru Megumi Han Luna Kokonoe Midoninger ==Cast== * Takaharu Igasaki / Akaninger: Shunsuke Nishikawa * Yakumo "Cloud" Kato / Aoninger: Gaku Matsumoto * Nagi Matsuo / Kininger: Kaito Nakamura * Fuka Igasaki / Shironinger: Yuuka Yano * Kasumi Momochi / Momoninger: Kasumi Yamaya * Kinji Takigawa / Starninger: Hideya Tawada * Luna Kokonoe / Midoninger, Kyuemon Izayoi (Voice): Megumi Han * Shishioh, Lion Haoh (Voice): Yukio Yamagata * Yoshitaka Igasaki: Toshihiro Yashiba * Tsumuji Igasaki: Takashi Sasano * Narration, Ninninger Equipment Voice: Tsutomu Tareki ===Guest stars=== * Sasuke (7): Teruaki Ogawa * Yousuke Shiina (7): Shin Shioya * Harukaze Kato (9): Yuko Ito * Kikyo Kousaka (29, 30): Chihiro Yamamoto * Kiroku Ise (30): Ryoma Baba * Toha Yamaji (34): Takumi Tsutsui * Tourist (34): Yoshi Sudarso * Elena (38): Seiran Kobayashi * Tsubasa Ozu (39): Hiroya Matsumoto * Shurikenger (Voice; 43): Taiki Matsuno ==Songs== ; Opening theme * "Saa Ike! Ninninger!" ("Let's Go! Ninninger!") ** Lyrics: Neko Oikawa ** Composition & Arrangement: Akira Sato ** Artist: Yohei Onishi ; Ending theme * "Nan ja Mon ja! Ninja Matsuri!" ("What's That! A Ninja Festival!") ** Lyrics & Composition: Motoi Okuda ** Arrangement: Funta 7 ** Artist: Daiki Ise Category:Super Sentai series Category:2015 Japanese television series debuts Category:2016 television series endings Category:2016 disestablishments in Asia
title: Shuriken Sentai Ninninger
